mapper.select: SELECT sum(decode(roll, 'U', 1)) as userCount , sum(decode(roll, 'A', 1)) as adminCount , count(id) as allCount FROM T_USER

SELECT MAX(ROWNUM) FROM T_USER
OR id LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%'
OR email LIKE '%'||#{email}||'%'

SELECT result2.* FROM ( SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT id, email, roll, regdate, deldate, DECODE(roll, 'A', '관리자', 'S', '수퍼', 'U', '사용자','') AS rollname FROM T_User
OR id LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%'
OR email LIKE '%'||#{email}||'%'
ORDER BY id ASC ) result1 ) result2 WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum} ORDER BY rnum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_User (id, pwd, email, roll, regdate) VALUES(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{roll}, SYSDATE)
